title: Acobamba District, Tarma
text: Acobamba or Aqupampa (<a href="Quechua%20language">Quechua</a> "aqu" sand, "pampa" large plain, "sand plain") is a <a href="Districts%20of%20Peru">district</a> in the middle of <a href="Tarma%20Province">Tarma Province</a> in <a href="Peru">Peru</a>. It is bordered by districts of <a href="Tarma%20District">Tarma</a>, <a href="La%20Uni%C3%B3n%20District%2C%20Tarma">La Unión</a> and <a href="Palcamayo%20District">Palcamayo</a> on the west, <a href="Huasahuasi%20District">Huasahuasi District</a> on the north, districts of <a href="Palca%20District%2C%20Tarma">Palca</a> and <a href="Tapo%20District">Tapo</a> on the east, and districts of <a href="Tapo%20District">Tapo</a> and <a href="Tarma%20District">Tarma</a> on the south.
